definition: to draw/picture/painting/CL:幅[fu2],張|张[zhang1]/classifier for paintings etc/variant of 劃|划[hua4]

home/family/(polite) my (sister, uncle etc)/classifier for families or businesses/refers to the philosophical schools of pre-Han China/noun suffix for a specialist in some activity, such as a musician or revolutionary, corresponding to English -ist, -er, -ary or -ian/CL:個|个[ge4]

sentences.english: The main concern is, whether those cartoonists are able to carry on their carrers as artists, just as they have been before?
sentences.chinese: 漫畫家能否再像以前一樣，作爲藝術家而生存？

sentences.english: Xia Da, 30, a cartoonist in Hangzhou.
sentences.chinese: 夏達，30歲，來自杭州的一名漫畫家。

sentences.english: Can cartoonist ever live as a real artist as they used to be?
sentences.chinese: 漫畫家能否再像以前一樣，作爲藝術家而生存？

sentences.english: This book includes 80 color illustrations, which were drawn by Ah Gui, a famous cartoonist.
sentences.chinese: 本書配有80幅彩色插圖，繪製者爲著名漫畫家阿桂。

sentences.english: I will briefly introduce some of my favourite Comics & Anime or Comic Writers here.
sentences.chinese: 這裏會簡略地介紹一些我喜歡的動漫畫或漫畫家。

sentences.english: It was easy to see why the cartoonists regularly portrayed him as a malign cherub .
sentences.chinese: 難怪漫畫家總是把他畫成一個邪惡的小天使。

sentences.english: Political cartoonists are giving definitions of their own.
sentences.chinese: 政治漫畫家給出他們自己的定義。

sentences.english: The highest and the autumn people will become a full-time cartoonist, started the comic strip?
sentences.chinese: 最高和秋人能成爲專職漫畫家，開始連載漫畫嗎？

sentences.english: Yuki midorikawa is one of my favorite Japanese cartoonists.
sentences.chinese: 綠川幸是我最喜愛的日本漫畫家之一。

sentences.english: Feng Zikai was China's first-ever caricaturist.
sentences.chinese: 豐子愷先生是中國的第一位漫畫家。

sentences.english: The author is a Japanese manga artist Gosho Aoyama reasoning is still serialized in the.
sentences.chinese: 作者爲日本推理漫畫家青山剛昌，目前仍在連載中。

sentences.english: He created the band with the comic book artist Jamie Hewlett.
sentences.chinese: 他還創造了漫畫家傑米休利特帶。

sentences.english: Only professional cartoonists can participate in the exhibition.
sentences.chinese: 只有專業漫畫家可以參加了展覽。

sentences.english: Conservative cartoonists are struggling to pierce Mr Obama's armour.
sentences.chinese: 保守派漫畫家正在努力刺穿奧巴馬的保護甲。

definition: serialized/published as a serial (in a newspaper)
voice actor (loanword from Japanese 声優 seiyū)
School of Minor-talks, one of the Hundred Schools of Thought 諸子百家|诸子百家[zhu1 zi3 bai3 jia1] during the Warring States Period (475-221 BC)
to create/to produce/to write/creative work/creation/CL:個|个[ge4]
cartoons and comics/animes and mangas/cartoon (animated movie)/anime
